title: Enlarging Stokes Shift of CuInS2 Quantum Dots Using Thiol-Ene Polymers for Efficient Large-area Luminescent Solar Concentrators
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02603A, Paper
Bo Xu, Yufan Wu, Jing Huang, Jianyang Zang, Jingjian Zhou, Changhong Cheng, Zhuang Hu, Dan Shan, Wenxing Yang, Ilya Sychugov, Licheng Sun
CuInS2/ZnS (CIS/ZnS) quantum dots (QDs) are extensively employed as fluorophores in luminescent solar concentrators (LSCs), due to their excellent optical properties and low toxicity. However, the power conversion efficiency (PCE)...
